EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for Successful Role Extract Generation
EmailTemplate.name: EnhancedEmailRole Success
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Role Extract Successfully generated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi UserFirstName,
Your Roles Extract request is successfully processed and the report is ready to be downloaded.
fileDownloadLink
This email is generated system generated. For any concerns kindly email to useremail.
The file and the email is generated as part of the "Enhanced Salesforce Role Package". Find more here at repourl.
